info.name: OnlineShopping API
info.description: Ready-to-import Postman collection for the OnlineShopping API. Base URL and JWT token are parameterized.

body.raw:
{
  "userId": "u123",
  "shippingAddress": "123 Le Loi, HCMC",
  "billingAddress": "123 Le Loi, HCMC",
  "paymentMethodName": "COD",
  "shippingMethodName": "Standard",
  "discountCode": "WELCOME10"
}
